name: Move Together
description:
Move Together is game were you control 2 player at once. You have to solve puzzles using this mechanic.  

Controls:

A--D to move

Space to Jump

E to enter the door

Music by Mega Game Music Collection, 

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/mega-game-music-collectio...

This is a game made for the GMTK gamejam.
